text: 3.7: Mt 12.34 naŋga, 23.33 naŋga, Lu 3.7 naŋga, Ro 5.9 naŋga, 1 Te 1.10Kamatɨhihi Farisi naŋga Sadyusi muvɨra, utɨrɨŋ arɨŋ kukuyɨ mɨŋaŋgɨrum vata payɨmu. Kamatɨhu nurɨŋ ŋgata nɨmavami, Tau ñambandu ñɨŋi narɨ. Narɨŋ nin ambahi Got narɨŋɨrɨm kɨtɨrɨ kɨta ñamba hɨvɨ ŋgurɨmandɨ nɨŋandɨhinɨrɨm tarahɨrɨmɨndaŋ vata andɨra.
